meanings.sent1: Sjoe! That magic trick was amazing!
meanings.sent2: Wow, sjoe, I can't believe you solved the puzzle so quickly!
meanings.sent3: Sjoe, that surprise party really caught me off guard!
meanings.sent4: Her talent on the piano made me say sjoe in awe.
meanings.sent5: The fireworks display left everyone shouting sjoe in wonder.

meanings.definition: Used to show relief or exhaustion.
meanings.sent1: Sjoe, I finally finished my homework!
meanings.sent2: Phew, sjoe, that was a long hike!
meanings.sent3: After the marathon, he collapsed on the ground, saying sjoe.
meanings.sent4: The end of the workday brought a sigh of sjoe from the tired employees.
meanings.sent5: The cool breeze after the hot day made her exclaim sjoe with relief.
